ComicInfo.Summary:
A kindly hermit nurses Nussbaum back to health. But no good deed goes unpunished, and this nice old man is about to learn some zealots can't be deprogrammed! Meanwhile, warring factions continue to bet their futures on either killing or weaponizing Nussbaum. A busy day in the underground.
From Patrick Kindlon (PATIENCE! CONVICTION! REVENGE!) and Stefano Simeone (CLANKILLERS) comes SHOPLIFTERS WILL BE LIQUIDATED - a satirical take on the consumer society.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-09 19:27:44. [CVDB735463]

ComicInfo.Title: Roomy Interior
